solution_line_template: Dr. Jones pays ${monthly_earning} / {electric_water_divisor} =$ <<{monthly_earning}/{electric_water_divisor}={electric_water_bill}>>{electric_water_bill} for his electric and water bill.
The total amount he pays for the bills and insurances is ${electric_water_bill} + ${insurance_cost} = $<<{electric_water_bill}+{insurance_cost}={total_bills_insurances}>>{total_bills_insurances}.

The remaining money from his earning after paying off the bills and insurance is ${monthly_earning} - ${total_bills_insurances} = $<<{monthly_earning}-{total_bills_insurances}={remaining_after_bills_insurances}>>{remaining_after_bills_insurances}.
The total amount he needs to pay for the rent and food expenses is ${house_rental} + ${food_expense} = $<<{house_rental}+{food_expense}={total_rent_food}>>{total_rent_food}.
